name: egoroof-blowfish
description: Blowfish encryption library for browsers and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:concat && npm run build:transpile && npm run build:wrap && npm run build:compress
scripts.build:concat: rollup -f es -i src/Blowfish.js -o dist/blowfish.js && node tools/distSize
scripts.build:wrap: rollup -f umd -n Blowfish -i dist/blowfish.js -o dist/blowfish.js && node tools/distSize
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run mocha
scripts.version: node tools/prepareReadme && git add package.json README.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: egoroof
